about_the_game:
This is the DEMO of "Gods from the Abyss" , an Eldritch-Lovecraftian beat'em up inspired by classic arcade games such as "Golden Axe", "Final Fight", "TMNT", etc.

Created by a solo indie developer, it contains five dark action stages (the DEMO features the first two levels). Join Mei and Bob, a duo of anti-paranormal fighters, in their battle against the Dark God cult, and its leader, Lord Crawford.

The game can be played by a single player, or by two players in local co-op mode. It supports keyboard, and compatible controllers.

Try the FREE DEMO first, and if you like the game, get the complete version!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of fantasy violence, animated blood, alcoohol references, mild language and flashing images that may be not suited  for people with photosensitive epilepsy.
